TestCaseDocumentation.Description: JAXB:SPEC:J2S:0236(0237) A field or property annotated with the @XmlElementWrapper annotation must be mapped as follows: If @XmlElementWrapper.namespace() is not "##default" and different from the {target namespace} of the enclosing class, then it must be mapped as specified as specified in Section Table 8-25, "Mapping: Property/field Element Wrapper with ref attribute,": {min occurs} ::= 1 {max occurs} ::= 1
